zh-cn: 薄谷开来、张晓军故意杀人案

location.zh-cn: 重庆市南岸区南山丽景度假酒店
location.en: Nanshan Lijing Resort Hotel, Nan'an District, Chongqing

description.zh-cn: 指2011年11月15日英国商人尼尔·海伍德被发现死于重庆南山丽景度假酒店的案件。此案由薄熙来的妻子谷开来主导，勤务人员张晓军协助谋杀，并最终导致了王立军事件和薄熙来事件。
description.en: Refers to the case where British businessman Neil Heywood was found dead at the Nanshan Lijing Resort Hotel in Chongqing on November 15, 2011. The murder was masterminded by Gu Kailai, wife of Bo Xilai, with assistance from family aide Zhang Xiaojun, and ultimately led to the Wang Lijun incident and the Bo Xilai incident.

death_place.zh-cn: 重庆市南岸区南山丽景度假酒店
death_place.en: Nanshan Lijing Resort Hotel, Nan'an District, Chongqing

description.zh-cn: 英国商人，与薄熙来家庭关系密切，后因经济纠纷被谷开来和张晓军毒杀。
description.en: A British businessman who had close ties to Bo Xilai's family and was later poisoned by Gu Kailai and Zhang Xiaojun over an economic dispute.

description.zh-cn: 中国律师，薄熙来的妻子，海伍德死亡案主犯。
description.en: A Chinese lawyer, wife of Bo Xilai, and the main perpetrator in the death of Neil Heywood.

description.zh-cn: 薄家勤务人员，海伍德死亡案从犯。
description.en: An aide to the Bo family and an accomplice in the death of Neil Heywood.

description.zh-cn: 原重庆市副市长兼公安局局长。在海伍德案后与薄熙来产生矛盾，进入美国驻成都总领事馆，从而揭发了该案，引发了王立军事件。
description.en: Former Vice Mayor and Public Security Bureau Chief of Chongqing. He had a falling out with Bo Xilai after the Heywood case and entered the U.S. Consulate in Chengdu, thereby exposing the case and triggering the Wang Lijun incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记。因王立军事件和海伍德死亡案倒台。
description.en: A Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Party Secretary of Chongqing. He was brought down by the Wang Lijun incident and the death of Neil Heywood.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与谷开来之子。
description.en: The son of Bo Xilai and Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 指2012年2月6日，时任重庆市副市长的王立军进入美国驻成都总领事馆滞留的政治事件，此事直接引爆了海伍德死亡案和薄熙来事件。
description.en: Refers to the political incident on February 6, 2012, when then Vice Mayor of Chongqing, Wang Lijun, entered the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu. This event directly triggered the re-investigation of the Neil Heywood case and the Bo Xilai incident.

description.zh-cn: 指因海伍德死亡案和王立军事件引发的，导致中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记薄熙来被免职调查的政治事件。
description.en: Refers to the political incident triggered by the death of Neil Heywood and the Wang Lijun incident, which led to the dismissal and investigation of Bo Xilai, then a member of the Politburo and Party Secretary of Chongqing.

nodes.id: 安徽省合肥市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 安徽省合肥市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 时任最高人民检察院首席女法医，曾公开质疑海伍德的官方死因。
description.en: Then chief female forensic examiner at the Supreme People's Procuratorate, who publicly questioned the official cause of Neil Heywood's death.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在薄熙来事件后接任重庆市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who succeeded Bo Xilai as the Party Secretary of Chongqing after the Bo Xilai incident.

description.zh-cn: 原重庆市公安局副局长，在海伍德死亡案中因徇私枉法被判刑。
description.en: Former Deputy Director of the Chongqing Public Security Bureau, sentenced for bending the law for personal gain in the Neil Heywood case.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国商务部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国商务部
en: Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 因经济利益矛盾并认为尼尔·海伍德威胁到其子薄瓜瓜的人身安全，主导并参与了对海伍德的毒杀。
description.en: Masterminded and participated in the poisoning of Neil Heywood due to economic conflicts and the belief that he posed a threat to her son, Bo Guagua's, safety.

description.zh-cn: 作为从犯，协助谷开来对尼尔·海伍德实施了谋杀。
description.en: As an accomplice, assisted Gu Kailai in the murder of Neil Heywood.

description.zh-cn: 因法国别墅产权及经济补偿问题与海伍德产生矛盾，在海伍德发出威胁后，认为其子薄瓜瓜受到人身安全威胁。
description.en: Had a conflict with Heywood over French villa ownership and financial compensation, and believed her son Bo Guagua's safety was threatened after Heywood made threats.

description.zh-cn: 曾担任薄瓜瓜的英语教师，并为其在英国留学做过咨询工作，帮助其进入哈罗公学。
description.en: Served as Bo Guagua's English tutor, provided consulting for his studies in the UK, and helped him get into Harrow School.

description.zh-cn: 在薄熙来任大连市长期间与其建立联系，帮助吸引外资，并与薄家保持密切关系。
description.en: Established contact with Bo Xilai during his tenure as mayor of Dalian, helped attract foreign investment, and maintained a close relationship with the Bo family.

description.zh-cn: 王立军进入美国驻成都总领事馆后，提供了关于海伍德案的关键证据，直接促使中国公安机关对该案进行复查。
description.en: After Wang Lijun entered the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu, he provided key evidence about the Heywood case, directly prompting Chinese public security organs to reinvestigate it.

description.zh-cn: 王立军向薄熙来报告谷开来在海伍德案中的重大嫌疑后，遭到薄熙来的打压和排挤，感到自身安全受到威胁，最终进入美国领事馆，引发王立军事件。
description.en: After Wang Lijun reported to Bo Xilai about Gu Kailai's significant suspicion in the Heywood case, he was suppressed and sidelined by Bo, felt his personal safety was threatened, and eventually entered the U.S. consulate, triggering the Wang Lijun incident.

description.zh-cn: 海伍德死亡案的复查和披露是导致时任中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记薄熙来被免职调查的核心原因之一。
description.en: The reinvestigation and disclosure of the Neil Heywood death case was one of the core reasons for the dismissal and investigation of Bo Xilai, then a member of the Politburo and Party Secretary of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 王立军事件的爆发直接导致了薄熙来的政治倒台。
description.en: The outbreak of the Wang Lijun incident directly led to the political downfall of Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 在王立军报告谷开来涉嫌谋杀海伍德后，薄熙来对其进行了掌掴，并调整其职务，将其排挤出公安系统。
description.en: After Wang Lijun reported Gu Kailai's suspected involvement in the murder of Neil Heywood, Bo Xilai slapped him and reassigned his duties, removing him from the public security system.

position.zh-cn: 重庆市副市长兼公安局局长
position.en: Vice Mayor and Public Security Bureau Chief of Chongqing

description.zh-cn: 王立军在重庆市任职期间，薄熙来是其上级，担任重庆市委书记。
description.en: During Wang Lijun's tenure in Chongqing, Bo Xilai was his superior, serving as the Party Secretary of Chongqing.

relationships.source: 安徽省合肥市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 因犯故意杀人罪，判处谷开来死刑，缓期两年执行。
description.en: Sentenced Gu Kailai to death with a two-year reprieve for the crime of intentional homicide.

relationships.source: 安徽省合肥市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 因犯故意杀人罪，判处张晓军有期徒刑九年。
description.en: Sentenced Zhang Xiaojun to nine years in prison for the crime of intentional homicide.

description.zh-cn: 就薄谷开来、张晓军故意杀人案向安徽省合肥市中级人民法院提起公诉。
description.en: Filed a public prosecution against Gu Kailai and Zhang Xiaojun for intentional homicide at the Hefei Intermediate People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 在知晓谷开来谋杀海伍德后，最初帮助其掩盖真相，对下属作出的“酒后猝死”结论未提异议，并指示下属处理案件以掩盖谷开来的罪行。
description.en: After learning of Gu Kailai's murder of Heywood, he initially helped cover up the truth, did not object to the conclusion of 'sudden death from excessive drinking' made by his subordinates, and directed them to handle the case to conceal Gu's crime.

description.zh-cn: 在王立军指派下，与其他警官共同作出海伍德系酒后猝死的虚假结论，以掩盖谋杀真相。
description.en: Under the direction of Wang Lijun, along with other police officers, made the false conclusion that Heywood died of alcohol poisoning to cover up the murder.

description.zh-cn: 作为时任最高人民检察院首席法医，公开质疑官方公布的海伍德死于氰化物中毒的结论，认为其“严重缺乏事实与科学依据”。
description.en: As the then chief forensic examiner of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, she publicly questioned the official conclusion that Neil Heywood died of cyanide poisoning, stating it 'seriously lacks factual and scientific basis'.

description.zh-cn: 据港媒报道，时任中共中央总书记胡锦涛亲自下指示，要求对谷开来判处死缓并谨慎处理此案。
description.en: According to Hong Kong media reports, then-General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee Hu Jintao personally instructed that Gu Kailai be sentenced to death with a reprieve and that the case be handled cautiously.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来被免职后，张德江接任重庆市委书记，并改变了薄在任时的政策路线。
description.en: After Bo Xilai's dismissal, Zhang Dejiang took over as the Party Secretary of Chongqing and changed the policy direction from Bo's tenure.

description.zh-cn: 介绍王立军给谷开来认识，并在二人关系恶化后于2012年1月尝试劝和。
description.en: Introduced Wang Lijun to Gu Kailai, and attempted to mediate between them in January 2012 after their relationship deteriorated.

description.zh-cn: 经由徐明介绍，王立军认识了谷开来。在谷王关系恶化后，徐明曾于2012年1月尝试劝和。
description.en: Wang Lijun was introduced to Gu Kailai by Xu Ming. After their relationship soured, Xu attempted to mediate in January 2012.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国商务部

description.zh-cn: 英国政府在得知海伍德死因可疑后，多次要求中国方面重新调查其死因。
description.en: After learning about the suspicious circumstances of Heywood's death, the British government repeatedly requested that the Chinese authorities reinvestigate the cause of death.

description.zh-cn: 时任英国首相卡梅伦与到访的中共中央政治局常委李长春会面，表达了英方对海伍德案的关注。
description.en: Then-British Prime Minister David Cameron met with visiting Politburo Standing Committee member Li Changchun and expressed the UK's concern over the Heywood case.

description.zh-cn: 进入美国驻成都总领事馆滞留，并申请政治避难。
description.en: Entered the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu, where he stayed and sought political asylum.
